name: Sangre Caliente (Warm-blooded)
body:
a freezed second
I ran through my house trying to escape the snakes
I went into the wardrobe 
one of them was about to jump out with its jaw wide open
-cut

2022 
Cotton canvas embroidered with human hair. 
60 x 70 cm





Ph: Catalina Romero (@fotografiadeobra)
